posts.post_title: SOLD: A pair of T206 Fords (Sovereign and Red Hindu)
posts.post_content:
Red Hindu: Card has been laminated on the front and back, but still a 
presentable example of a tougher reverse SOLD

Sovereign 460: Trimmed 

Please click the image to see larger scans. 

$50 for the trimmed Sovereign SOLD
